text:
STUDIOS—UNIVERSITY OF WASHINGTON
CHANNEL
KCTS-TV
TRANSMITTER—EDISON TECHNICAL SCHOOL
SEATTLE 5, WASHINGTON
September 20, 1962
Bill Harley
NAEB
Washington, D. C.
p0ear Bills
I want you to know that the statement you prepared on the
AFTRA problem in New York is the only really intelligent
comment I have seen on the matter,
I was quite disappointed in the NEA statement — it was
entirely self-serving, trying to make sure that they
retained jurisdiction over the teachers, and not let it
get away to a union,
I didnjt think Jack White’s comments were very well put,
and showed a great lack of understanding of the union
problem, I have been really fearful that the naive boys
in New York are going to get us into a lot of trouble.
Thanks for preparing such a fine statement.
Loren B, Stone
RECEIVED
NAEB HEADQUARTERS
SEP 24 1962
PM
TiMWWiMMW.
